review: It's much slower than you would expect to go between menus. I have a Chromecast and its weakness is that it doesn't have a UI. This device does.HUGE DOWNSIDE: They have disabled streaming from the phone to the TV through it. You have to use a pay service to do this. Chromecast is based on this, so that's the one that's plugged in to my TV now. Oh well, it was only $24...
